name: GHOSTWARE: Trespasser
description:
What's going on inside Galactamax laboratories? And why is their PR staff so adamant in calling you a conspiracy theorist? There is only one way to find out if the results of your private investigations have been unnecessarily alarming

This is a tie-in to the story of GHOSTWARE: Arena of the Dead, a much larger FPS/Adventure project that we are currently developing (a new and expanded demo for it will be out soon-ish )

Take the role of an unnamed protagonist and experience this short experience which will give you a few hints about the lore of the world where GHOSTWARE takes place, and don't forget: a good investigation doesn't leave any clue behind...

Follow us on Twitterfor more updates
or join our Discord server to chat

note: this was made in under three days, so keep that in mind while playing it

  • Mothership Loudspeakerz: art, story, programming
